description: Returns CRO analysis with data insights, prioritized recommendations for pricing/inventory/marketing/operations/GMC optimization, actionable tasks, and conversion metrics with potential improvement estimates

analysis.data_summary: No specific data provided; recommending based on e-commerce best practices and common CRO opportunities.
key_findings: Conversion rates can be significantly improved through pricing optimization and streamlined checkout.
Inventory management often impacts customer satisfaction and repeat purchase behavior.
Effective marketing and Google Merchant Center optimization increase site traffic quality and conversion potential.

recommendations.title: Implement A/B Testing for Key Product Price Points
recommendations.description: Run price tests on your top-selling SKUs to identify optimal price points that maximize conversions and revenue without sacrificing margin.

recommendations.title: Simplify and Speed Up Checkout Process
recommendations.description: Reduce the number of required fields, offer guest checkout, and display trust badges to minimize friction and boost completed transactions.

recommendations.title: Prioritize Stock Availability for Best-Sellers
recommendations.description: Monitor sell-through rates and proactively replenish inventory of high-converting products to avoid stockouts and lost sales.

recommendations.title: A/B Test High-Traffic Landing Pages and Ad Copy
recommendations.description: Optimize landing pages and paid ad messaging for top-performing products to improve engagement and reduce bounce rates.

recommendations.title: Enhance Product Feed Quality and Completeness
recommendations.description: Update all product feeds with optimized titles, detailed descriptions, and complete attributes to improve shopping ad visibility and click-through rates.
recommendations.expected_impact: 2-5% increase in conversion rate from Google Shopping

action_items.task: Set up and execute price A/B tests on at least 5 top SKUs
Audit and streamline the checkout process, focusing on removing unnecessary steps
Flag best-sellers for proactive stock management and weekly inventory check-ins
Launch at least two A/B tests on landing pages and ad copy for high-traffic products
Review Google Merchant Center feed for missing data and optimize high-priority SKUs

metrics.current_conversion_rate: Typically 1-3% for general e-commerce; use your analytics for precise figure
metrics.potential_improvement: Up to 10-15% relative increase with combined recommendations
